privateData.title: Fill in your personal details
privateData.text: It's hard to borrow your book when you don't even know who and where it is.

books.title: Add books to the library
books.text: When there are books in the library, users have more confidence in you.

successBorrow.title: Successfully borrow books
successBorrow.text: The larger your transaction history, the more books you lend, the more people will turn to you.

successRequest.title: Successfully close debts
successRequest.text: Don't forget that your delays in closing the debt are disrespectful to the owner of the book and to the one who wants to borrow it next.
